ygData.subject: Re: Guild or not, lets play together.
ygData.msgSnippet: Cool. My ultimate char will still be a tank mage, coz get too used to be one in UO for quite sometime.  Even when the mediation skill/evaluate INT skill patch
ygData.messageBody:
Cool.

My ultimate char will still be a tank mage, coz get too used to be one in
UO for quite sometime. Even when the mediation skill/evaluate INT skill
patch in UO, I still let my main char remain as a tank mage rather than
swtiching him over to mage ;)

On the other hand, since EQ dun have tank mage char, I think the one that
suit me most is magician or necromancer (too hard to play due to its evil
nature) - a tank *AND* a mage ;)

Even for my current wiz char, I still insist he practice his melee as and
when he can. What he need most now is healing skills. I will try to team
up with a magi out there and see if I can get some free supply of bandages,
hehe. I know normally shld pay lah, but most of the players I met in EQ
are quite helpful in the sense that they normally dun charge for summoned
stuffs, esp when u group with them. As for me, I always give away those
summoned foods/drinks on me to others b4 I logout, dun waste mah.

Ziltus

On Thursday, May 27, 1999 6:41 PM, Gary Qui Hong Loong
[SMTP:kanglun@...] wrote:
> From: "Gary Qui Hong Loong" <kanglun@...>

of

a
> human paladin with 100 str. He's lvl 5 after 1 day of play. I hope to hit
> lvl 8 or 9 tonite. Wish me luck.
> His name is Garren.
